dmca.title: Macromedia Complaint to Google (#1)
dmca.body:
05/06/2002 11:09 
FAX [private]
MACROMEDIA
001

macromedia
FAX

Date: April 26, 2002

To: [private], User Support

Fax Number: [private]

From: [private]

Regarding: Illegal posts

Pages: 1 (including cover)

Google,

	1. The copyrighted work at issue is the crack that is posted for our copyrighted beta software, Dreamweaver.
	2. Message-ID: oOmlcuRjnggtsbct2kvum89e1c3bndrgpg@4ax.com
	3. Vulture [private]
	4. N/A
	5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly Infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law. 
	6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely, 

[private]
Senior Investigator, Anti-Piracy
Macromedia, Inc.
[private]
San Francisco, CA 94103
[private]
[private] fax
[private]

This facsimile contains confidential information which may also be privileged. Unless you are the addressee (or authorized to receive for the addressee), you may not copy, use, or distribute it.  If you have received it in error, please advise Macromedia immediately by telephone or facsimile and return it promptly by mail.  Thank you.

Macromedia
[private]
San Francisco
California 94103, USA
www.macromedia.com
